description.para: #TEST-67 (Two Spell Tokens from the same object are applied)
#TEST-66 (Both A & B - You should see Fireball, x4 different DCs and Casterlevels)
#TEST-64 (Feat & Template - You should see two Magic Missile Spells, x2 and x3 an hour)

skill.name: Uber Scripting from five ranks in Test Coding Script
skill.synergy: Uber Scripting from five ranks in Test Coding Script

feat.name: TEST-64
feat.description: Please give SPELLS (the token) to a character that grants the exact same spell twice, but from different sources. The spell, spell book, timeunit, caster level (if any), DC (if any) must all be the same (the times may be different if you so choose) Add Template of Same Name to Complete Test.

feat.name: TEST-67
feat.description: Put two SPELLS tokens that apply to the same Spell Book (e.g. Innate) into an object and grant that object to a PC. (This ensures that multiple entries work)

character.weapon_proficiencies: Dagger, Extra Blade, Simple Weapon Four, Simple Weapon One, Simple Weapon Three, Simple Weapon Two, Spear, Suns Weapon Of Choice, Unarmed Strike

templates.list: TEST-64, TEST-66A, Test-63a1, Test-63a2, Test-63b1, Test-63b2, Test-63c1, Test-63c2, Test-96, Test-96a, Test-96f, Test-96h, Test58, Test58b

spell.name: Detect Magic
spell.effect: Detects spells and magic items within 60 ft.

source.source: PCGen Team - PCGen Testing Set, SpellsD-E

spell.description: Detects spells and magic items within 60 ft.

source.source: PCGen Team - PCGen Testing Set, SpellsH-L

spell.name: Magic Missile
spell.target: Up to five creatures, no two of which can be more than 15 ft. apart

source.source: PCGen Team - PCGen Testing Set, SpellsM-O

spell.name: Magic Missile
spell.target: Up to five creatures, no two of which can be more than 15 ft. apart

source.source: PCGen Team - PCGen Testing Set, SpellsM-O

spell.name: Fireball
spell.duration: As long as you want up to 50 days [Should be CL x 10]
spell.effect: What ever you want here, 5 [casterlevel], 50 [casterlevel x 10], 5 [min casterlevel ,10]

school.descriptor: DangerousFubarStuff, I wouldn't touch it if I were you
